text: Star Lane is a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station in Canning Town, East London. It is on the Stratford International extension of the Docklands Light Railway between West Ham and Canning Town.Docklands Light Railway - Stratford International Extension It opened on 31 August 2011. ==References== Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham
title: Star Lane DLR station
